Xie et al. He et al. Maqsood et al. Rani et al. Zhang et al. Sun Baili et al. Amin et al. Al-Adhaileh et al. Alarjani and Almarri Aldhyani et al. Ding et al. Buttar et al. Maity et al. Alharbi et al. Alenezi et al. Sathya et al. Rauf et al. Almarri et al. Alzakari et al. 3 Conclusion This Volume-II of editorial presents 21 research papers exploring AI-assisted medical imaging for integrating automated pathology and radiology systems. The aim was to curate impactful work within AI-driven healthcare. The contributions reflect a growing trend toward intelligent diagnostic solutions, with future efforts encouraged to further enhance integration across both domains using advanced AI techniques. We sincerely thank all authors for their valuable contributions and the reviewers for their timely and insightful evaluations that enhanced the quality of this collection. We also extend our appreciation to the Frontiers in Medicine editorial team for their continuous support in making this Research Topic a success. Author contributions PS: Methodology, Investigation, Writing – original draft. VR: Writing – review & editing, Resources, Project administration. AB: Validation, Writing – review & editing, Visualization.
